ygData.subject: Re: - Blanket Quest In Qeynos...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I am supposed to give blanket to the cold and needy in the Qeynos/Karanas area. I cannt find anyone who worships Karana and is cold (the so-called
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

I am supposed to give blanket to the cold and needy in the
Qeynos/Karanas area. I cannt find anyone who worships Karana and is cold
(the so-called requirements for the quest). If some one could point me
toward the neddy I will gladly offer up new found blankets. Thank you...

-Dycedarg
Knight of Thunder

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dan Kassiday [SMTP:kassiday@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 11:49 PM
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: reef sharks
>
> From: "Dan Kassiday" <kassiday@...>
>
> I bought two sharkskins and got the lousy reward which included a
> small lantern... lost money on the deal
>

> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> From: rmiller@...
> Send reply to: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqpaladin] reef sharks
>
> > From: rmiller@...
> >
> > I am a level 8 paladin, and the only quest that I have attempted from
> the Guild instructors wanted me to kill some reef sharks and bring back
> the skins. I can't find the reef sharks in the Ocean of Tears anywhere.
> I have found one hammerhead shark and killed it but didn't get a skin.
> Any
> idea where to find "reef sharks"??? Just a hint would be great! Thanks
> for your help.
> >
> > Grod
